/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their red roofs add a pop of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. 

Trees with lush green leaves provide a natural contrast to the urban architecture. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. On the right side of the street, a white van is parked, perhaps belonging to one of the residents or visitors of the area. 

The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the scene. It's a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, where tradition and modernity coexist harmoniously.
